originalText.text: I came to see Dr. Churgin for a breast reduction and it was the best decision I ever made. Her and her entire staff are so nice, easy to talk to and were extremely helpful through the whole process. I never felt nervous...they made me feel completely comfortable and if anything, excited! I am now 1 month post op and in love with my results. Dr. Churgin is phenomenal at what she does.

text.text: I came to see Dr. Churgin for a breast reduction and it was the best decision I ever made. Her and her entire staff are so nice, easy to talk to and were extremely helpful through the whole process. I never felt nervous...they made me feel completely comfortable and if anything, excited! I am now 1 month post op and in love with my results. Dr. Churgin is phenomenal at what she does.

originalText.text: I came into Dr. Churgin's office looking to have a breast reduction. I was super nervous about the process and as soon as I met with her and talked about what I'd like to look like as well as all of my concerns I felt at ease. She answered all of my questions and explained everything throughly. I was so thankful to have found a doctor as patient, caring and kind as she is. Her team is also phenomenal, I was always able to speak to Kathy, Heidi and Frank whenever I needed assistances or had any questions. They were also extremely helpful and patient with my medical insurance during the process of getting my surgery approved. I love that Dr. Churgin has a location in Manhattan as well as Babylon making it very easy to arrange post op appointments. I am now 8 months post op and I feel more confident, empowered and no longer have neck and back pains. I would absolutely recommend Dr. Churgin to anyone!

originalText.text:
I am  3 Months post-up today- BREAST REDUCTION and BODY CONTOURING. Lovely overall experience dealing with the front-line staff both in the Long Island and Manhattan office. Particularly for my case, I worked with Heidy and Cathy. We were able to get MY INSURANCE to APPROVE my breast reduction as it was a medically necessary procedure. The approval process between my insurance and Dr. Churgin’s staff was seamless.  Through-out the entire process from my first phone call to all my post-op appointments, they have been very responsive and a pleasure to be in contact with . In addition, her mother Mrs. Churgin was wonderful, she went above and beyond to assist me in all areas as necessary.
I am extremely happy with my results, the outcome turned out way better than I could have ever expected. Dr. Churgin is compassionate, personable, professional  and most importantly  transparent. Aside from my breast reduction I also had some body contouring done, and she did a phenomenal job with that as well. I finally have a nice shape!!!! I could not recommend her enough. I spent 3 days calling a bunch of different surgeons and did my research, this review is all the reassurance you have been looking for! Dr. Samara Churgin absolutely exceeded my expectations .

originalText.text:
Dr Churgin has completely changed my life. I had drastic weight loss of 120lbs+ which left me with a lot of extra skin- leading to physical & mental battles every day. After some not so great experiences with previous surgeons, Dr. Churgin was genuinely a life saver. She is understanding, compassionate, intelligent & very very skilled. Her work is amazing and I’m so thankful to have found her. This is the result of my first of many procedures with Dr. Churgin and I couldn’t be happier!! Thank you.

Frank, Heidi, Kathy, Anne & Mrs. Churgin have been so great along this journey, I can’t thank you all enough!

originalText.text: Dr. Churgin and her office staff are amazing. Dr. Churgin made sure I understood all facets of the procedure I was having and made me feel at ease with the whole process. The office staff, specifically Frank, Kathy, Ann, and Jocelyn, were absolutely incredible and by far the best office staff of any medical office I've ever been to. I cannot say enough good things about them and Dr. Churgin!
